resources.string: Allow showing over other apps. This is necessary for correct work of the application
If your device does not have this permission, you can ignore it
In the App Info > Permissions > Allow Show on Lock screen/Lock screen notification

Turn on the lock screen display, so that the device can display the charging animation normally when the screen is locked, but the setting paths of various devices are different, please refer to the following settings

Meizu setting path: Settings -> Apps -> Charging Animation -> Permissions -> Show on Lock screen/Lock screen notification

Xiaomi setting path: setting -> Apps -> permissions -> Permissions -> Charging Animation -> Show on Lock screen

OPPO setting path: Settings -> Apps -> Charging Animation -> Notification Management -> Display on the lock screen

VIVO setting path: i Manager -> Software Management -> Permissions Management -> Lock Screen Display -> Charging Animation -> Check to open
Bring FUN to your phone\'s charging screen
Find the Charging Animation as you wish
Give a minute to some important points
